Body:
self.original_stdout = sys.stdout
sys.stdout = pydevd_io.IOBuf()
try:
    sys.stdout.encoding = sys.stdin.encoding
except AttributeError:
    pass
try:
    client_port, _server_port = self.get_free_addresses()
    client_thread = self.start_client_thread(client_port)
    import time
    time.sleep(0.3)
    from _pydev_bundle import pydev_localhost
    interpreter = pydevconsole.InterpreterInterface(pydev_localhost.
        get_localhost(), client_port, threading.currentThread())
    result, = interpreter.hello('Hello pydevconsole')
    self.assertEqual(result, 'Hello eclipse')
finally:
    sys.stdout = self.original_stdout
